title: Hastings Banda
summary: Hastings Kamuzu Banda (c. 1898 or 1906/1907[2][3][4] â€“ 25 November 1997) was the Prime Minister and later President of Malawi from 1964 to 1994 (for the first year of his rule as it achieved independence in 1964, Malawi was the British protectorate of Nyasaland). In 1966, the country became a republic and he became president. His rule has been characterized as a "highly repressive autocracy."[5]
